text: Mohammad Idris is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Chittagong-12. ==Career== Idris was elected to parliament from Chittagong-12 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1973. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Chittagong District
title: Mohammad Idris (politician)
